author: dain
msg: Added support for java.endorsed.dirs to be set via a manifest entry.  The endorsed dirs property controls where the jvm looks for new versions of sax, dom and corba classes.
Set endorsed dirs in server.jar and client.jar to <geronimo-install-dir>/lib/endorsed

author: bnicholes
msg: Add a target to build the prebuild utilities on NetWare

author: ekoneil
msg: Fix JIRA 258 -- remove the NetUI TLDs from web.xml.
